snippet: The F.H.A. is said to be experiencing escalating losses. | Greece is once again considering pressuring private sector creditors to accept a deal. | A Congressional reports delivers "a withering critique" of Jon S. Corzine over MF Global. | President...
abstract: The F.H.A. is said to be experiencing escalating losses. | Greece is once again considering pressuring private sector creditors to accept a deal. | A Congressional reports delivers "a withering critique" of Jon S. Corzine over MF Global. | President Obama begins efforts to mend fences with the business community.
